org.phpmaven.plugin.build
Class AbstractPhpMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      org.phpmaven.plugin.build.AbstractPhpMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo, IPhpConfigurationMojo, IPhpWalkConfigurationMojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractPharMojo, AbstractPhpResources, PhpExec, PhpTest
public abstract class AbstractPhpMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
implements IPhpConfigurationMojo, IPhpWalkConfigurationMojo

Helper class to give fast access to the PHP executable and the basic configuration.

Author:
Christian Wiedemann, Tobias Sarnowski
